mapper.select:
select ort.rn , ort.boardno , ort.title , ort.matchgametype , ort.matchregion , ort.membernum , ort.matchdate , ort.content , ort.boarddate , ort.count , ort.nick , atd.d as agreeCount from (select rownum rn , ot.boardno , ot.title , ot.matchgametype , ot.matchregion , ot.membernum , ot.matchdate , ot.content , ot.boarddate , ot.count , ot.nick from (select mb.boardno , mb.title , mb.matchgametype , mb.matchregion , mb.membernum , TO_CHAR(mb.matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS matchdate , mb.content , TO_CHAR(mb.boarddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boarddate , mb.count , u.nick from matchboard mb, users u where mb.userNo = u.userNo
and mb.title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and mb.matchregion like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and u.nick like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and mb.matchgametype in (#{matchgametypeValue})
and mb.matchgametype in (0,1)
and mb.content like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
order by mb.boardNo desc ) ot ) ort left join ( SELECT boardNo, COUNT(*) as d FROM attendusers WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY boardNo ) atd on ort.boardno = atd.boardNo where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select count(*) from matchboard mb, users u where mb.userno = u.userno
and mb.title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and mb.matchregion like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and u.nick like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and mb.matchgametype in (#{matchgametypeValue})
and mb.matchgametype in (0,1)
and mb.content like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'

select mb.boardNo, mb.title, mb.matchgametype, mb.matchregion, mb.memberNum, TO_CHAR(mb.matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS matchdate, mb.content, TO_CHAR(mb.boardDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boarddate, mb.count, mb.status, u.nick, u.userNo, u.profileImage, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendusers WHERE boardNo = mb.boardNo AND status = 1) AS agreeCount from Matchboard mb JOIN users u ON u.userNo = mb.userNo where mb.boardNo = #{boardNo}
